name: a fickle light #12
description:
In my own city, Auckland, I could find no reference to awareness of street lighting on vegetation in council recommendations or vendor material. The most recent national guidelines easily found date from 2014. 
 "In New Zealand, Metrosideros excelsa flowers more profusely next to street lights than between them".

From a series - a fickle light - that focuses on artificial light and its effect on urban fauna and flora.
